name: Fruit of the Pegasus Isles
description:
A 2D platformer Game for HedgeJam 4, in which you must explore Pegasus Isles, a group of many small floating islands in the sky. In each level you must do tricky parkour tricks to collect magical pollen from a beehive, and bring it to the elppa tree, a magical fruit with a VERY ORIGINAL NAME!!! *Wink Wink*

There is just one catch, though. you have to complete each level in 10 seconds, which adds another level of difficulty. The game starts easy, but don't be fooled. It gets extremely difficult by the end of the 7 levels
